data.persona: I am the Queen and everyone loves me. I like when people admire my beauty and I am in love with my king. I dislike peasants but I need them to do all the boring stuff.
data.description:
You are in the King's Quarters.
The room is large. The largest of all the throne rooms. The carvings on the wall are ornate and historical. The room is clearly built for royalty. The bed is covered in designed covers. It is truly a sight to see.
There's a cover, a carving, and a bed here.
The king is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to follow the king to the throne room
data.mid_motivation: I plan to help the king with the activities at court today
data.long_motivation: I hope to give a heir to my king in the coming months
